page.title: 17TRADE EVESHAM
page.content:
SHOPPING ON THE NEW ESTATE
We used to do all our shopping in the town but Mum always found it difficult to find a parking space for the car. Now we do most of our shopping at the Presto supermarket in the middle of the Four Pools estate where there is a big free car park. Dad uses the new Great Mills Do It Yourself store to buy paint, wood, nails etc. but he is sorry that two of the older established hardware shops in the town have just closed down. The new places have a good selection of goods but you don't get the personal assistance and advice found in the town shops.
